result.title: Plan for the Dissemination and Communication of the action Results (PDCR)
result.description: The Deliverable moves from the preliminary draft plan presented in the proposal that be updated at the beginning of the project and regularly during the project timeframe, including a record of activities related to Dissemination and Communication (D&C).
